page.title: 11Recrearion
page.content: Holidays Some people do not go on holidays because they are working on farms and have to look after animals. This means that some children just go away for days. Places in England visited by children in the school include Windermere and the Lake District,London,Chichester,Preston,Bla ckpool and Stafford.Sometimes these holidays were with relations.Places visited in Scotland are Edinburgh,Inverness, Loch Ness, Isle of Arran, Aviemore and Glasgow. Places abroad visited include Malta, Spain and Italy. One family own a caravan and go touring every year.
